title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Spice AI operationalizes data lakes for AI using Amazon S3 (STG364)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Spice AI 如何使用 Amazon S3 为 AI 运营化数据湖 (STG364)
abstract: Learn how Amazon S3 and S3 Vectors turn data lakes into intelligent, searchable foundations for enterprise AI. See how Spice AI uses its open-source data and AI platform on AWS to integrate S3 Vectors with open table formats, enabling hybrid SQL and vector search directly on S3 without complex data movement. With in-memory acceleration on S3 and Amazon Bedrock integrations like Titan Embeddings and Nova Models, Spice AI provides 100x faster queries at millisecond latency for its customers while maintaining enterprise-grade governance and scalability. Discover how S3 Vectors and Spice AI power the next generation of retrieval-augmented AI at scale.
abstract_cn: 了解 Amazon S3 和 S3 Vectors 如何将数据湖转变为智能、可搜索的企业 AI 基础。了解 Spice AI 如何在 AWS 上使用其开源数据和 AI 平台将 S3 Vectors 与开放表格式集成，直接在 S3 上实现混合 SQL 和向量搜索，无需复杂的数据移动。通过 S3 上的内存加速以及与 Amazon Bedrock 的集成（如 Titan Embeddings 和 Nova Models），Spice AI 为其客户提供快 100 倍的查询速度和毫秒级延迟，同时保持企业级治理和可扩展性。探索 S3 Vectors 和 Spice AI 如何大规模驱动下一代检索增强 AI。
